lines.text: You're weak like your father.
You're ugly like your mother.
Ah, Huey! Lewis! Any news?
I just want total domination of one major American City! Is that too much to ask for? Is it? Is it? Huh?

[to Billy and Jimmy as he's being taken away by the cops]
You think I'M bad, wait'll you meet my lawyers!

Thousands of years ago in ancient China, an evil army of Shadow Warriors terrorized the great city of Changsa. To save his people, the good king sacrificed himself to create a mystical medallion. Realizing the ultimate powers of the medallion, the king split it in half. To one son, he gave the power over body; to the other, the power over the soul. This is the legend of the Double Dragon.
Look who's talkin', UG Lee.
Get it straight. YOU'RE "Ug" Lee. I'm "Home" Lee.
Oh, okay...

[phoning]
Shuko? Lash. We found it.
HOME Lee. UG Lee. DANDY!

[possessed by Koga Shuko]
Do you know the story of Romulus and Remus - sons of Mars, God of war?

[speaking to his half of the Dragon Medallion]
If you're waiting for an emergency, this is it.
The brothers were abandoned and raised by wolves. Together, they built the great city of Rome.

[to Koga Shuko]
Shadow Demon, you shall not pass.
In a quarrel, Romulus killed Remus.
My whole life just flashed before my eyes! Dude, I sleep a lot.
Are you crazy? We almost wrecked our CAR!
Oh, Sh...
You said it!

[peering through an eyehole]
I can see you!
No, you can't!
[shoves broom handle through eyehole]
Aw, shit!

[both]
You said it!
[combines both pieces of the medallion]
Watch Your Step." Watch your step?
[falling, screaming, landing, looking about them]

[surrounded by angry martial arts children]
Great! The Power Corps are midgets.
You need some help? Why didn't you guys use the stairs?

[pointedly to Jimmy]
"Please use other door."

[checking his computer for the identities of the people in the car ahead of them]
Hey, we know these guys! It's the Lee brothers, Ug and Home, ha-ha.
Who?

[in the car ahead]
Make a right on Wilshire.
Oh, I get it - UG-Lee, HOME-Lee. Ah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha...

[facing danger together]
So what's the plan?
I'm still workin' out the small details.
Your incompetence sticks needles into the flesh of my honor.
This thing'll kill me.
Perhaps. But I consider you like a son, Abobo. And like a son, I can always have another.
Well, who is this hungus bogosity who says he's gonna unite the gangs?
Nobody knows who he is. He's totally hollow, but he's spreading the goods around, and if we don't jack in, we'll all be vapor!
What is he, nuts? Maniacs don't take orders from anybody! Do we mind-share?
Yuck!
Yuck!
This water's gross.
It should have a seat and a lid over it.
What's up, chickenbutt?
